java.code: package com.thealgorithms.devutils.nodes; /** * Simple TreeNode extension that holds references to two child Nodes (left and * right). * * @param <E> The type of the data held in the Node. * * @author <a href="https://github.com/aitorfi">aitorfi</a> */ public class SimpleTreeNode<E> extends TreeNode<E> { /** * Refrence to the child Node on the left. */ private SimpleTreeNode<E> leftNode; /** * Refrence to the child Node on the right. */ private SimpleTreeNode<E> rightNode; /** * Empty contructor. */ public SimpleTreeNode() { super(); } /** * Initializes the Nodes' data. * * @param data Value to which data will be initialized. * @see TreeNode#TreeNode(Object) */ public SimpleTreeNode(E data) { super(data); } /** * Initializes the Nodes' data and parent node reference. * * @param data Value to which data will be initialized. * @param parentNode Value to which the nodes' parent reference will be set. * @see TreeNode#TreeNode(Object, Node) */ public SimpleTreeNode(E data, SimpleTreeNode<E> parentNode) { super(data, parentNode); } /** * Initializes the Nodes' data and parent and child nodes references. * * @param data Value to which data will be initialized. * @param parentNode Value to which the nodes' parent reference will be set. * @param leftNode Value to which the nodes' left child reference will be * set. * @param rightNode Value to which the nodes' right child reference will be * set. */ public SimpleTreeNode(E data, SimpleTreeNode<E> parentNode, SimpleTreeNode<E> leftNode, SimpleTreeNode<E> rightNode) { super(data, parentNode); this.leftNode = leftNode; this.rightNode = rightNode; } /** * @return True if the node is a leaf node, otherwise false. * @see TreeNode#isLeafNode() */ @Override public boolean isLeafNode() { return (leftNode == null && rightNode == null); } public SimpleTreeNode<E> getLeftNode() { return leftNode; } public void setLeftNode(SimpleTreeNode<E> leftNode) { this.leftNode = leftNode; } public SimpleTreeNode<E> getRightNode() { return rightNode; } public void setRightNode(SimpleTreeNode<E> rightNode) { this.rightNode = rightNode; } }
